QuestionStem: What is the possible benefit of the behavior to the macaques? Select all that apply.

options.AnswerText: A. The reproductive success of the mother may increase.
B. The offspring might grow and develop into a healthy adult.
C. The offspring might learn this behavior from its mother.
D. The reproductive success of the father might decrease.

CorrectFeedback: Reproductive success, offspring health, and offspring teaching are all possible outcomes of this behavior.
PartiallyCorrectFeedback: Reproductive success can be the result of parenting, offspring, and courtship behaviors.
IncorrectFeedback: Reproductive success can be the result of parenting, offspring, and courtship behaviors.
FinalIncorrectFeedback: Reproductive success, offspring health, and offspring teaching are all possible outcomes of this behavior.
